title: Motion to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim
description: Defendant moves to dismiss plaintiff's complaint under FRCP 12(b)(6) for failure to state a claim upon which relief can be granted.

title: Motion for Summary Judgment
description: Plaintiff moves for summary judgment on liability based on undisputed material facts.

title: Motion to Compel Discovery Responses
description: Plaintiff moves to compel defendant to respond to outstanding discovery requests.

title: Motion in Limine to Exclude Expert Testimony
description: Motion to exclude defendant's expert testimony as unreliable under Daubert standard.
outcome: Motion granted in part, denied in part
notes: Expert may testify on limited topics

title: Motion to Suppress Evidence
description: Defense motion to suppress breathalyzer results and field sobriety test evidence due to Fourth Amendment violations.
